snippet: Weld North plans to expand Organic Avenue, a juice and raw foods purveyor with eight stores in the New York area, into cities like Los Angeles and Miami and gain distribution in grocery stores and other retail outlets.
abstract: Weld North plans to expand Organic Avenue, a juice and raw foods purveyor with eight stores in the New York area, into cities like Los Angeles and Miami and gain distribution in grocery stores and other retail outlets.

headline.main: Weld North Takes Controlling Stake in Juice Chain
